channel.title: Tempo Offset Feature
channel.description: It would actually be so helpful if you could add tempo offset to scenes. It would be a scale of negative to positive, and it works like the effects for instruments (ex. Pitch, Volume) and you can make a line that offsets the tempo of the soundtrack.
